content: this is a noob question: I find myself with casts (working with an inductive type of proofs and bumping up against the lack of a recursor for the code generator to use) and I understand that there is a tactic norm_cast; but I cannot find how to access it as it isn't in Mathlib.Tactic.NormCast . I've checked the sources of mathlib4 and there are plenty of references to @[norm_cast]. Regardless of whether it's wise to try to use this tactic to alleviate casting problems, how can I get hold of it please?
ach silly me I was using norm_cast wrongly!
Matthew Fairtlough has marked this topic as resolved.
